fields.name: Contact requesting new hire (First and Last name)
fields.description:
Input your name here to indicate who is requesting the new hire. New hires and terminations are limited to **Authorized** personnel. Input your first and Last name so we can confirm you are authorized to make the request.
*Example: John Doe*

fields.name: Submission Date
fields.description: Enter today's date for the New User Request

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The day the New Hire will be starting
